channel.title: Two Questions
channel.description:
1. How do i add it so everytime a player logs on it announces over the server "Moparscape has logged on, there is now 7 players online"
2. How do i have it so every 5 minutes a text pops up in the chat box, "Read the rules at hour website"

item.title: Two Questions

item.description:
